00031 // statics
00032 
00033 SingletonUse<LogManager> StepClock::m_log;
00034 
00035 unsigned int StepClock::selectStep(unsigned int stepsPerTick) {
00036   if( stepsPerTick<=0 ) {
00037     m_log->syslog("Clock")<<"Requested an invalid number of steps per tick ("
00038                        <<stepsPerTick<<").\n\tSetting it to 50.\n";
00039     stepsPerTick = 50;
00040   }
00041   return stepsPerTick;
00042 }
00043 
00044 unsigned int StepClock::parseStep(rapidxml::xml_attribute<> *steps) {
00045   if( NULL==steps ) {
00046     m_log->syslog("Clock")<<"missing steps attribute in XML definition.\n"
00047                        <<"\tSetting it to 50.\n";
00048     return 50;
00049   } else 
00050     return selectStep(string_cast<unsigned int>(std::string(steps->value(),
00051                                                      steps->value_size())));
00052 }

00054 // structors :
00055 
00056 StepClock::StepClock(double sleepSeconds, unsigned int stepsPerTick) 
00057   :Clock(sleepSeconds), m_tick(0), m_currentStep(0), 
00058    m_stepsPerTickDefault(selectStep(stepsPerTick)) {
00059   m_stepsPerTick = m_stepsPerTickDefault;
00060 }
00061 
00062 StepClock::StepClock(rapidxml::xml_node<> const &node) 
00063   :Clock(0.0), m_tick(0), m_currentStep(0),
00064    m_stepsPerTickDefault(parseStep(node.first_attribute("steps"))) {}
00065 
00066 // modifiers :
00067 
00068 TICK StepClock::getNextTick() {
00069   if( m_currentStep>=m_stepsPerTick ) {
00070     Clock::advanceTick(m_tick);
00071     m_stepsPerTick = m_stepsPerTickDefault;
00072     m_currentStep = 0;
00073   } else 
00074     ++m_currentStep;
00075   return m_tick;
00076 }
00077 
00078 // observers :
00079 
00080 void StepClock::setMaxSteps(unsigned int nSteps) const {
00081   if( nSteps>0 ) {
00082     m_stepsPerTick = nSteps;
00083     m_currentStep = 0;
00084   }
00085 }
